Title: Chapter 8
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Beau Willimon, Sam Forman (staff writer), Kate Barnow (story editor)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Corey Stoll
Plot: Frank has a library named after him at his old military school. Peter tries to win back the support of his hometown.
